20+ years of experience!

Built upon throughout the history of the Web, I've been working with computers and web-based technologies since before the ".com era". (In fact, I've been working with computers since the early 1980s). I've watched technologies come and go; I've seen fabs ebb and wane.

As a full-stack Engineer (front- and back-end), I have the knowledge and experience of working full breadth of websites and web-based applications.
